name: Rocket Fly VR
description:
How to deal with loud fly in your room 101.
ROCKET LAUNCHER edition.

It's finally a time to get revenge on that one little fly that's following you, your whole life.

*If you want to do successful rocket jump, you have to look where you are shooting*

Hey, I make a new free VR game every week, so if you wanna stay updated I post daily here:

https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/

https://twitter.com/sir_fansi
